title: Same-sex marriage plaintiff on RBG: She believed in equal justice
description: CNN's Anderson Cooper speaks with Jim Obergefell, a plaintiff in the case that legalized same-sex marriage, about Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg's legacy. Watch "Full Circle" every Monday, Tuesday and Friday at 6p E.T.

author: Skylar Mitchell, CNN
title: 150 lower income pregnant Black and Pacific Islander women in San Francisco to get $1,000 monthly
description: Through a new pilot program, approximately 150 lower income Black and Pacific Islander pregnant women in San Francisco will receive a $1,000 monthly stipend in an effort to curb high rates of deaths related to pregnancy and childbirth.
